general.name: spAllLine
general.short: migrated from old datamodel - needs update
general.description:
This file contains a summary of the Spectro-1D outputs for all spectra
merged with the matched photometric data and spInspect data.

releases.name: WORK
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another
